body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a cooper and farmer in Bourbon County. Served as postmaster of Shawhan, Bourbon County from 1857-1859.

Spouse: Mary Frances Tate (Robinson)
Children: Charles Tate, Francis Tate, John Tate, Mattie Tate, William Tate, Mary Tate, Julia Tate
